=What's coming next...=

==1) Inform when an item is an interaction item ==

When the current item in the off-screen model can be interacted with the user should be informed.  Currently, the interact button is enabled - but the user is not informed.

==4) Overview function==

On a page level or section level (maybe more...) a user can press the "overview" button (hot key Y) to hear a high level overview of the items contained in the section - for example, they might hear "bulleted list contains ten items", rather than each item.
